backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a contact form submission system with functions to submit, retrieve, and list submissions stored in a Map by auto-incrementing ID.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting six implemented homepage features (hero, services, why choose us, portfolio, testimonials, contact CTA) with high confidence and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the routing structure, pages, components, styling, and backend integration for the Codetykoons website.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode CSS variables for a blue-themed design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags, Open Graph/Twitter cards, and Google Fonts (Inter, Poppins) for the Codetykoons web development company site.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining six routes (Home, About, Services, Portfolio, Pricing, Contact) wrapped in a Layout component.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form component with validation for name, email, phone, and project details that submits to backend using React Query mutation with success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with company info, quick links, services list, social media icons, and Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing consistent Navigation header and Footer structure across all pages using TanStack Router Outlet.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Navigation component with sticky header, logo, desktop/mobile menu toggle, and route highlighting using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for contact form submission and fetching submissions from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, color schemes, and fade-in animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page component displaying company mission, values with icons, and statistics in a multi-section layout.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page with hero section, contact information (email, phone, WhatsApp, location), and ContactForm component.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page component with hero section, services overview (6 services with icons and images), why-choose-us section, portfolio preview (3 projects), testimonials (3 client reviews), and CTA section with intersection observer animations.
frontend/src/pages/Portfolio.tsx: Portfolio page displaying 6 detailed project case studies with images, descriptions, technologies used, and feature lists across categories (E-commerce, Corporate, Web Application).
frontend/src/pages/Pricing.tsx: Pricing page with three tiered plans (Starter $999, Professional $2,499, Enterprise $4,999+) and four add-on services, featuring detailed feature lists and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Services page with detailed descriptions of all 6 core services (Custom Web Dev, E-commerce, Web Apps, SEO, Maintenance, API Integration), each with feature lists and images.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, container settings, extended theme with custom fonts (Inter, Poppins), shadows, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document defining Codetykoons website architecture (Node.js backend, blue/white design), image requirements for services/portfolio, and completed feature list with requirement IDs.
